title: Is there a way to translate canvas without invalidation of surface ?
body:
Hi, 

When I press right button and move I do canvas translation.
When I scroll up/down I do canvas scale.

Elements placed on the canvas have fixed position (on the video we have images but it can be any type of shapes (rectangles, circles, lines, paths etc.)).

[sample video](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1C59gB0GyxhJIFsDanSvtncdIY_Irqg7n/view)

Is there a way to translate/scale canvas without invalidating surface ?
Currently, each time when mouse move is handled, the surface is invalidated and I need to re-draw whole elements. Performance suffers according to number of elements on the canvas.

I would be glad for any suggestions how to improve it.
